seo.title: GMR 2526 xHD2 Open Array Radar and Pedestal | Garmin
seo.ogDescription: GMR 2526 xHD2 is a powerful high-definition radar with 25 kW of power and 6-foot open array with power to deliver range up to 72 nautical miles.

overviewTab.title: Overview

inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box
inTheBoxTab.content:
• GMR 2526 xHD2 (Antenna and Pedestal)
  • Mounting hardware kit and template
  • Power cable (15 meters)
  • Network cable (15 meters)
  • Cable grommet
  • Voltage converter
  • Documentation

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
General
Dimension

6' array: 76.25" x 5" x 6.75" (193.6 x 12.7 x 17.1 cm)

Pedestal: 20.5" x 12.75" x 12.5" (52 x 32.4 x 31.8 cm)

Weight

array: 16.9 lb (7.7 kg)

pedestal: 47.1 lb (21.4 kg)

Water rating IPX6
Max Wind Load80kt
Antenna Length72" (182.88 cm)
Rotation speed (RPM)24 and 48 rpm
Beam width1.1° horizontal, 23° vertical
Maximum range96 nm
Minimum range20 meters
Radar typeOpen-Array

Electrical features
Power Input10-32 V DC
Transmit power25 kW

Radar Features
DUAL RANGE
Overlay
Dual radar support
Auto Bird Gain
Auto GainDynamic
MARPA target trackingYes (requires heading sensor, sold separately)
Echo Trails
Programmable antenna parking
Target sizePulse Expansion

seo.title: Garmin GMR™ 18 xHD Radome | Marine Radar
seo.ogDescription: The GMR™ 18 xHD Radome is an easy to install marine radar with 48 or 24 ROM rotation speeds and a 48-mile max range setting.

productEmsList.tooltip:
Radome: Compact format adapts easily to the limited space of a small craft; ideal for day trips or coastline sailing.
Open Array: Offers enhanced performance and greater range; mainly suited for experienced mariners and longer sessions at sea.
productEmsList.title: Radar Type
